Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.client.clientModel

Class ClientModel

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.client.clientModel.ClientModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatSub, GameSub, PlayerBoardSub, PlayerSub, Subscriber, Serializable, Remote
public class ClientModel extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ChatSub, GameSub, PlayerSub, PlayerBoardSub
ClientModel is a class which handles the logic of the game and its status on client side
See Also:

    • updateCommonTable

      public void updateCommonTable(ResourceCard resourceCard, int index) throws RemoteException
      Updates the common table after a player draws a card
      Specified by:
      updateCommonTable in interface GameSub
      Parameters:
      resourceCard - updated card on top of a deck
      index - specifies which deck is updated, 0 refers to the Resource Deck, 1 to the Gold Deck and 2 to 5 refer to the four cards in the common table

    • UpdateCrashedPlayer

      public void UpdateCrashedPlayer(String nickname, ArrayList<Text> chat, State gameState, ArrayList<ResourceCard> hand, ObjectiveCard objectiveCard, Map<String,PlayableCard[][]> boards, Map<String,Integer> points, ArrayList<String> players, ArrayList<ObjectiveCard> objectiveCards, Color color, ArrayList<ResourceCard> table, ArrayList<Color> colors) throws RemoteException
      Updates the player who rejoined the game after crashing.
      Specified by:
      UpdateCrashedPlayer in interface GameSub
      Parameters:
      nickname - the current player
      chat - text messages from the group chat and text messages of which the player was the sender or the receiver
      gameState - current game state
      hand - player's personal cards
      objectiveCard - player's secret objective card
      boards - updated boards of each player
      points - updated score of each player
      players - turn order of the game
      objectiveCards - common objective cards
      color - color of the local player
      table - contains the cards located in the common table
      colors - color of each player associated to his nickname
      Throws:
      RemoteException - RMI Exception
